review.title: “Excellent craftsmanship, inspiring instruments and dedicated builders”
review.pros: Pros – Both the owner and the managers have a shared vision for the company. For skilled workers who are, or who aspire to be, organbuilders, this is a good place to work. Clients are highly satisfied with the products and services which adds to employee satisfaction.
review.cons: Cons – Stowe is near Pottstown, and both are reasonably close to Philly. If you like small towns, this would work for you.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I am neither a current or former employee, and not an owner. However, I know this company from ten years of association
